song.englishname: My Help Comes From The Lord

english.segment1: When sorrows come and hope seems gone. You're the rock I rest upon. When waters rise and I can't breathe. You're the love that rescues me. Out of the darkness. It lifts up my eyes. Unto the hills I feel my faith rise
english.segment2: Maker of heaven. Giver of life. You are my strength, my song in the night. My refuge, my shelter, now and forevermore. My help comes from the Lord
english.segment3: When I'm broken, scarred by sin. Death gives way to life again. When I suffer, when I'm bound. In You I'm free, In You I'm found
english.segment4: Out of the darkness. It lifts up my eyes. Unto the hills I feel my faith rise
english.segment5: Maker of heaven. Giver of life. You are my strength, my song in the night. My refuge, my shelter, now and forevermore. My help comes from the Lord
english.segment6: Out of the darkness. It lifts up my eyes. Unto the hills I feel my faith rise
english.segment7: Maker of heaven. Giver of life. You are my strength. You're my refuge now and forevermore
english.segment8: Out of the darkness. It lifts up my eyes. Unto the hills I feel my faith rise
english.segment9: Maker of heaven. Giver of life. You are my strength, my song in the night. My refuge, my shelter, now and forevermore. My help comes from the Lord. My help comes from the Lord
